name: Montezuma Falls
description:
Introduction

Loop can be done as a non- technical hike with popular trail outside of watercourse. Obstacles can by bypassed if needed.

Approach

Park across street from main trailhead to avoid fees. Hike up the watercourse to the lower falls. Down stream from the falls is a staircase RDC. At the top of the stairs you can pay under 5 dollars for access to top falls.

Descent

Creek hiking with 3 falls up to 80'.

Falls can be jumped, rappeled (retrievable anchor) , or bypassed easily.

Exit

Take the exit located where you paid for access. Walk short but steepnroad back down to your car.

OR Return the way you came.

Red tape

Route can be done non technical and is basically one stunt rappel with two short jumps prior.

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
